title: News View :: The World On Arirang
text: South Korean exports fell by the biggest margin among world's top 10 exporters from January to July of this year.Trade has been declining worldwide due to the global economic slowdown and the U.S.-China trade war, but Korean exports have been the hardest-hit, according to WTO data.Korea's outbound shipments in the first seven months of the year, amounted to 317 billion U.S. dollars, down 9 percent compared to a year earlier.The second-largest drop was posted by Hong Kong, where exports fell 6.7 percent followed by roughly 5 percent declines in Germany and Japan.
description: 한국을 대표하는 글로벌 방송! The World On Arirang!
